nodes.text: The Tapani sector was a sector in the galaxy. Procopia was the capital world of the sector.

The Tapani sector first appeared in several Star Wars Legends literature including the role-playing guides Tapani Sector Instant Adventures, Lords of the Expanse and the Player's Guide to Tapani. It later appeared in the non-Canon LEGO Star Wars: The Resistance Rises episode "The Trouble with Rathtars", which first debuted on April 13, 2016. In the episode Han Solo and Chewbacca's ship Eravana eluded several First Order TIE/fo space superiority fighters there while delivering a shipment of rathtars.
